ygData.msgSnippet: My characters are Xirius - Warrior Exojia - Enchanter Good luck all new EQ2 players. ... __________________________________ Do you Yahoo!? Meet the all-new My
ygData.messageBody:
My characters are

Xirius - Warrior
Exojia - Enchanter

Good luck all new EQ2 players.


--- Melanie Johnson <melanie_6602@...> wrote:

> Good to see others having fun in EQ2. I'm loving it
> as
> well!
>
> --- Wulfric Rennison <wulftech@...> wrote:
>
> > But what are your characters' names so I can look
> > you up?? I've been thinking about joining a
> guild.
> > I saw a few recruiting, one called Remnants of
> > Luclin and another called The Windtalkers, and
> I've
> > seen a few others running around but I haven't
> > actively been looking. I was kind of waiting to
> see
> > if any of my friends from EQ1 are going to make
> the
> > switch and then join whatever guild they're in.
> > From what I understand guilds get levels now too
> so
> > I guess it remains to be seen how the whole guild
> > thing will turn out.
> >
> > Wulfric
> >
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Rob LeBeau
> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > Sent: Wednesday, November 24, 2004 1:31 PM
> > Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Fuyn in EverQuest II
> >
> >
> > Wulfric,
> >
> > I am on Crushbone as well
> > Maybe we can hook up.
> > I have a level 15 warrior and a level 12
> chanter.
> >
> > I will look up your chars next time on.
> > Few of my friends are working on starting a
> guild.
> > Just need the money LOL
> >
> >
> >
>
>
